vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Pi-beseth = "mouth of loathing"
This name is used for:
1) a town of lower Egypt located on the west bank of the Pelusiac branch of the Nile about 40 miles from Memphis
1a) same as 'Bubastis' named after the goddess of the same name
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比伯實 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 低微之家
下埃及的城鎮, 座落於尼羅河支流 Pelusiac 河的西岸,
離摩弗約有 40 哩左右 #結 30:17|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比伯实 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 低微之家
下埃及的城镇, 座落于尼罗河支流 Pelusiac 河的西岸,
离摩弗约有 40 哩左右 #结 30:17|
